scripts.application: concurrently -n db,be,cc,sc,fe -c blue,green,grey,magenta,yellow "npm run database" "npm run backend" "npm run car-clients" "npm run smart-contract" "npm run frontend"
scripts.application-no-car-clients: concurrently -n db,be,sc,fe -c blue,green,magenta,yellow "npm run database" "npm run backend" "npm run smart-contract" "npm run frontend"
scripts.smart-contract: cd blockchain && npm i && npm run ganache
scripts.frontend: cd blockchain && npm i && npm run deploy-and-copy && cd .. && cd ./frontend && npm i && npm run typechain && npm run dev && npm run apiGenerate
scripts.car-clients: dotnet dev-certs https --trust && wait-on -v https:localhost:7258 --interval 5000 && echo 'Backend is ready!' && cd CarClient && dotnet run
